casebody.data:
The Soybel Drug Company v. Myra Soybel et al.

King, C. J., Alcorn, House, Thim and Ryan, Js.

Argued January 8 decided January 8, 1970 Julius B. Kuriansky, for the appellants (defendants). Harry M. Lessin, with whom, on the brief, was Abraham D. Slavitt, for the appellee (plaintiff). Per Curiam.

The judgment rendered was predicated on the trial court’s exercise of a judicial discretion upon a consideration of all of the equities involved. It cannot be said, as a matter of law, that the court abused that discretion.

There is no error.
